page.title: 08MORE LOCAL CUSTOMS
page.content: {Whit Sing.} Every year there is a Whit Sing on the village green.Loxley Silver Band play and people from the churches gather round to sing hymns.The band and the church people walk to the green along the road from Wisewood. People come to listen and join in. Someone talks to the people and says a prayer. {Loxley Methodist Silver Band} The Band was started nearly 100 years ago with people from the church. It is still called Loxley Methodist Silver Band but although it practises at the church no one from the church is actually a member of the band now. The band plays on special village occasions such as the Whit Sing and also in local parks and at other local church events. At Christmas time it specialises in playing the local carols in the local public houses.
